channel.title: Tidy Tuesday on A Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tidy Tuesday on A Data Blog

item.title: Tidy Tuesday: French Train Schedule Analysis with Tidyverts
item.description: Tidy Tuesday This is my very first Tidy Tuesday post where I analyze a data set that I have never seen before. The astute may notice this blog date is very much not NOT a Tuesday. Instead, the name comes from the weekly Tidy Tuesday data sets procured by the R For Data Science online community. French Train Schedules I chose a data set from the past containing French train line schedules, along with accompanied statistics aggregated at the monthly level.
